title: The Cabin in the cotton
creator_credit: Michael Curtiz, First National Pictures and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: A tenant share-cropper is befriended by a southern plantation owner. He finds himself torn between loyalty to his class and an obligation to their enemy who is also his benefactor. Cast includes Richard Barthelmess, Dorothy Jordan, Bette Davis, hardie Albright, David Landau. Based on the novel by Harry Harrison Kroll.
